Text: Thanks you very much!! That was quick :D
can you copy the update to your hdd or do you need to have a flash drive inserted all the time?

I've download this update and injected it in "Data/Cache" has instructed however, the 3 playable stories do not work (prompts for a update to play 3 stories).

Could you help thanks
Unless you have the HDD transfer cable, you will have to have the USB device connected at all times when you want to play these packs.
